Description:
Detects the execution of "sysctl" with specific arguments that have been used by threat actors and malware. It provides system hardware information.
This process is primarily used to detect and avoid virtualization and analysis environments.


Author: Pratinav Chandra
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: System Information Discovery Via Sysctl - MacOS
Query: sourcetype like 'macos-%' eql select * from _source_ where ((process_path like '%/sysctl' and command like '%sysctl%') and (command like '%hw.%' or command like '%kern.%' or command like '%machdep.%'))
